name: Mina Gawargious
title: Digital Design Engineer
about: I am a UT Austin Masters grad with 3 years of digital design experience. I have used a slew of tools, including Questa Lint, Questa CDC, Synopsys Spyglass Lint, and Cadence Genus to design and verify complex IPs. I am always seeking knowledge and ways to hone my skills to develop technology that improves the world
